title: Perfect Blend
description: Previously a 2 part series - now a complete novellaA meeting for sex at a BDSM club turns sour for Caro Jones. An outcome made even more unfortunate because the man who uses her so harshly is her Mr. Perfect. The club owner, the hard, sexually voracious Conrad Blaine. Despite this she is smitten and wants more of him. Slowly but surely he leads her down a road of no return, a road that sees Caroâ€™s surrender to his BDSM style of sex. She allows him to dominate and subject her to a session in his den. Hungry for even more, Caro agrees to a group sex session with him and some of the other Doms from the club
